meanings.sent1: The potentates of the ancient kingdom were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The potentates of the land held immense authority over their subjects.
meanings.sent3: The potentates decided to have a friendly competition to see who could eat the most grapes.
meanings.sent4: The potentates' influence spread like wildfire, shaping the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The image of the potentates sitting on their thrones was etched in the minds of the people.

meanings.definition: A person who possesses great power or influence.
meanings.sent1: In the business world, she was known as one of the most influential potentates.
meanings.sent2: The political potentates were able to sway public opinion with their words.
meanings.sent3: The potentates organized a charity event to raise funds for the local shelter.
meanings.sent4: Her charisma made her a potentate in the world of fashion, admired by many.
meanings.sent5: The potentates' decisions had a ripple effect across the entire industry.
